name: Rainbow Spinning Background
description: MIDI-reactive chromafog background with spinning conic gradient. Features adjustable hue rotation and bloom opacity. Optional MIDI support for real-time control via CC messages. Keyboard shortcuts: H for hue, B for bloom.

safety.notes: MIDI access only requested after explicit button press. Pure CSS animation with conic gradient. Respects prefers-reduced-motion. Can be used without MIDI via sliders or keyboard.
